actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-488.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 5998, a bill to provide additional authorizations of appropriations for the fiscal year 1983 for the International Communication Agency, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5998 (International Communication Agency funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 5998, a bill to provide additional authorizations of appropriations for the fiscal year 1983 for the International Communication Agency, and for other purposes.
